channel.title: Blog on Mehmet Enes Onuş
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Mehmet Enes Onuş

item.title: Making a new Website
item.description: For a long time this website has had a couple of links to contact me, but those days are over. Now I have a brand new Hugo website with a custom written theme complete with A homepage with more social links, and description of my skills An about page with description of who I am A portfolio page to showcase all my projects A blog Why Hugo? The first question is why a site builder?

item.title: My first big project PolyPharm
item.description: How did we decide to start this project Before moving on to how I did this project, what technologies I used, etc., I would like to explain the thinking behind this project and how we got to this point in this project. Almost all of us have a relative in our family who uses some type of medicine. Older people, in particular, take more pills than prescribed, take pills more often, and most likely sometimes forget to take their medication, due to different prescriptions.
